casebody.data:
Linda GROOMS, Administratrix of the Estate of John Grooms, Sr., Deceased, petitioner,
v.
HUNTER HOLMES McGUIRE VETERANS ADMINISTRATION MEDICAL CENTER, et al. No. 16-962. Supreme Court of the United States April 3, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
